column5: very nice.  I too thought I had been banned for a few moments, but I did ome digging at ontariofishing.net and facebook and figured out what was going on.  glad its back!!
Wait, don't tell me...and the other half are heterosexual right?
LOL me too and shortly after I posted about not being able to log on early am.
"Trisexual" Try just about anything LOL
Well,  it turns out that the ones that wanted to meet me.....aren't even women.   Never leave this board.  Never leave this board. Never leave this board.
I still cant open it at work but works fine at home. One of those weird things i guess, glad its back tho missed it!
Thank God its back!!!!!
my pc always said "Forum maintenance in progress" I wasn't worried
That was nuts!!  Any thoughts!  Where were you when OFC DIED!
Our server went down.

Great thread SNAG,   Well, let me begin,  o I was not working when I think I should've been and then my life ended, online.  I thought,  "what's the point of fishing if I can't gratify myself in front of strangers?"   I used my down time to reconnect with my family and build a small rocket to fly to the moon!
Me too!
OFC being down finally gave me the opertunity to take my Chritstmas Tree down!!!! wife was happy  not sure whether becasue of the Christmas Tree been taken down or because OFC going down!!!!!
I kept getting FORBIDDEN to enter, I racked my brain trying to think of what Ihad posted that was bac enough to get me banned.  Thankheaven it wasn't me
Could have been a bit more contructive Grant and built your rocket for Mars, since they did find traces of water on there and maybe some Humungus Alien Snoek !!!
I don't know about anyone else but I found my productivity at work went up a little
It was hard to be productive when your hyperventilating in a corner... all alone.... so alone........  Thank god thats over.
Now that made me laugh out loud  :thumbsup_anim:
I started drinking heavily... got a pedicure... trimmed off some dingleberries that had been bothering me...  ... ya gotta make your own fun wherever you can find it eh!
I read the Toronto Star yesterday...  Never again!  Long live OFC... And Grants grand fooleries!  WOOOHOOOOHHHH!!
I almost went fishing.......
Grant...I texted you what was going on...to the last cell phone number that I had for you...LOL
I thought I was Permanently banded.  My next thought was. Budget Cut!
hahahahahahahaha im puking hahahahahahahahahahahaha
LMAO......
Haha that is exactly what was going through my head too.
I've never seen my computer in standby mode that long before Man I just didn't have any interest in surfing the NET.... thank God were back LM

lol @ everyone.......  I was not aware that OFC was down till a member sent me a message on facebook asking what was up......They could not acccess OFC.....AND thought they had been banned because of a certain riske thread or something like that....I saiddd Naaaa they don't play that way with out warning you 1st.....Came to log in everything was fine for me........Told him must be a Glitch.  When i came to log on next day nothing......I wasen't worried though not with A team like we have at the Helm.....Not for one second.  I know you guy's would have it fixed........
You guys are hilarious!!   Cliff, I just saw the text message!  That's just funny!!!
Some of us actually had to do some work at work!!!  I missed having OFC running in the background & taking a peek at new posts every now & then.
Grant I got so desp. I almost joined another forum. It was just a bad dream  Jose
I found out that there's other stuff on the internet besides this place.  Did you know there's naked women on the internet?  ........and half of them want to meet me!
Lol Jose,  I tried looking on other sites for clues to what happened here!!!
